snippet.title: Solve Mysteries with Detective Pikachu!
snippet.description:
Get ready to tackle cases in Detective Pikachu, coming to the Nintendo 3DS family of systems in spring 2018! With this tough-talking, coffee-drinking, one-of-a-kind Pikachu by your side, you can talk to witnesses, hunt for clues, and uncover the secrets of Ryme City. Visit our site for more details: http://bit.ly/2CXGVqz

Official site: http://www.pokemon.com/DetectivePikachu 
Shop: http://www.pokemoncenter.com
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Pokemon 
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/Pokemon 
Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/pokemon 
Tumblr: http://www.pokemon.tumblr.com
